channel.title: Change yell text color
channel.description: Where do i change the yell text color in Hybrid Pvp source? I think its PI.

item.title: Change yell text color
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

If its pi just do the above and find your yell command in Commands.java, then where the writing is ie player you can put @red@ @blu@ @gre@ just before the writing or just replace the current colors in there with those.

Read full topic

item.title: Change yell text color
item.dc:creator: @EzioAuditori EzioAuditori
item.description:
@EzioAuditori wrote:

Go to server>model>player>packets>commands.java

Search for code[/code]
On every other line there should be a thing that says
[Mod]
[Admin]
[Owner]
[Donator]

Next to each of those there should be a code that say <col=(numbers)> or <shad=(numbers)>

If you want to change the entire color of the chat use <shad=(any number here)>
If you want to just change the “[Mod]” or whatever name it is, color then use <col=(any number here)>

I don’t know any of the shad or col numbers but if you type in random numbers you can sometimes end up with pretty cool colors.

Read full topic
